templates: Keep Going, Player! You've started your journey with {{total}} wishes across different banners. Among them, you have {{5-count}} dazzling 5-stars and {{4-count}} sparkling 4-stars. Even Aalto would be impressed by your progress! Keep summoning, and more treasures await you!
